Package orego.book

Classes dealing with the opening book, which is generated automatically from a large collection of games by strong human players.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OpeningBook
    A book which quickly finds good moves during the opening.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BigHashMap<V>
    Associates keys (longs, Zobrist hashes of board configurations) with values.
    BookBuilder
    General class for building opening books.
    CombinedBook
    Combines the FusekiBook and JosekiBook, using the JosekiBook if no move is returned by the FusekiBook.
    FusekiBook
    Selects the most popular move given the current whole-board state.
    FusekiBookBuilder
    Reads in a directory of files containing SGF games, then stores the information into a map, which is then saved in a file.
    JosekiBook
    Suggests a joseki move (in the same corner as the last move if possible).
    JosekiBookBuilder
    Reads in a directory of files containing SGF games, then stores the information into a map, which is then saved in a file.
    JosekiBuilder
    Superclass for joseki books.
    SmallHashMap
    Maps longs to ints.
    StarPointsBook
    Plays on star points.

Package orego.book Description

Classes dealing with the opening book, which is generated automatically from a large collection of games by strong human players.

To rebuild an opening book, put .sgf files in SgfFiles/19 or SgfFiles/9, set the board width in orego.core.Coordinates, and run either FusekiBookBuilder or JosekiBookBuilder.
